titleStmt.title: Syrophænissa or, the Cananitish womans conflicts in twelue seuerall tractats discouered, sectio prima. At Horndon on the hil, in the countie of Essex. 1598. Dulcescit Christus, amarescit mundus R.W.
titleStmt.author: R. W. (Robert Wilmot), fl. 1568-1608.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The conflicts of the woman of Canaan.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
